comments.body: it's weird to see `'b` representing a table name, `'b` usually represents a column.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -281,7 +281,7 @@ class JoinHintSuite extends PlanTest with SharedSQLContext {
           JoinHint(
             Some(HintInfo(strategy = Some(SHUFFLE_HASH))),
             Some(HintInfo(strategy = Some(SHUFFLE_HASH)))) :: Nil,
-        msgNoHintRelationFound("d", "merge(b, d)") ::
+        msgNoHintRelationFound("d", "merge('b, 'd)") ::

comments.body: That's the default output from the hint parameters. I simply called `toString` for all the parameters.
